column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Radio operator says : " We have a strong signal , but no one 's answering . "
#Text=Korra says : " I ca n't just sit around here while a madman is on his way to the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=With a full force of the Metal Clan security backing us , we can take them .
#Text=" Mako says : " We 'll never make it up there before Zaheer .
#Text=" Korra says : " There might be another way to stop him .
#Text=It 's a long shot , but Zaheer is always meditating into the Spirit World .
#Text=And I know exactly where he goes : Xai Bau 's Grove .
#Text=If I can find him there , maybe I could somehow trap him .
#Text=" Lin says : " We ca n't protect you in there .
#Text=I do n't like it .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll be fine .
#Text=I have to try .
#Text=" Asami says : " I 'll watch over her as she meditates .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I guess , in the meantime , Mako and I will stay here and try to get through to the temple .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " We 'll help Su ready the airship .
#Text=" Yin says : " I 'm going to take a nap .
#Text="
